!You must pass individual tests to obtain marks. The *Mark of the Scholar* is only given to those who pass the Trial of the Scholar. You must be above *level 35* to take the test. To take the Trial of the Scholar, visit *Magister Mirien in the temple of Dion Castle Town*. The *Mark of Fate* is only given to those who pass the Testimony of Fate. You must be above *level 37* to take the test. To take the Testimony of Fate, go to *Giran Castle Town and meet Dark Elven Magister Kaira*. And finally, the *Mark of the Summoner* is only given to those who pass the Test of the Summoner. You must be above *level 39* to take the test. To take the Test of the Summoner, visit *High Summoner Galatea of Gludin*. [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30474/24.htm|Return]Â
